well if hes speaking to a "spirit" how do we know they feel the same sensat=
ions as we do...maybe in there mind there cold..I have a file where someone=
 says they we thirsty..which got a reply by someone else to "grab a cola" t=
his is not on a GB however its on a Digital recorder..I get evp from anythi=
ng not just GB...I also have gotten a file that said "its hot in here" i ha=
ve posted that once before..at that time it was not hot..we had the air on =
and it actually was a little chilly so just because it may not be cold in s=
outh Africa at this time (don't know) does not mean that's not how there ar=
e feeling..then you have to think what do they mean by the word "cold" are =
they speaking on the weather or there state of mind...just a thought..

---=
 On Tue, 12/28/10, Snowfire Lioness <SnowfireL@...> wrote:


From: Snow=
fire Lioness <SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file upload=
ed to EVP-ITC
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, December 28, 2010,=
 8:31 PM


=C2=A0 




Well, he says, "south bedford, UK to me, maybe it's =
the difference in which program we listen to them on each time?=C2=A0 I did=
 find a South Bedford, and they are having really bad weather right now, do=
n't know what's going on in Africa right now. sf




-----Original Message-=
----
From: Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
S=
ent: Tue, Dec 28, 2010 4:57 pm
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded=
 to EVP-ITC



=C2=A0 








Oh brother...are you kidding us, Snow?
=C2=
=A0
For what it's worth, the file in question is unmistakable to my ears an=
d DEFINITELY says "South Africa." 
=C2=A0
Why can't some=C2=A0people hear t=
hese things? I=C2=A0understand now=C2=A0why Frank gets so frustrated at tim=
es, especially when people tell=C2=A0him (or Steve or anyone, really!) what=
 their files "really" say. 
=C2=A0
Further, I don't think people here share=
 their=C2=A0files so that others can (mis)=C2=A0"interpret" their recording=
s=C2=A0for them! 
=C2=A0
I've seen this happen over and over and over again=
 (usually by the same people) and personally I feel that it's incredibly ru=
de, condescending and totally obnoxious. 
=C2=A0
My two cents, 
J
=C2=A0


=

Th=
ank you for correcting me, hopefully one day i will have a better ear to he=
ar the communication like you do. 

Maybe Frank and I should give up. He ha=
s about 8 years listening to box communication and i have about 5, but the =
newer people are empatically telling us what our files really say.

Maybe F=
rank and I are losing our ear for this.

-Steve
